scripts.analysis:dev: cd code-analysis-server/CodeAnalysisServer && dotnet build --no-restore --nologo && dotnet run --no-build --no-restore --nologo
scripts.analysis:release: cd code-analysis-server/CodeAnalysisServer && dotnet build --no-restore --nologo -c Release && dotnet run --no-build --no-restore --nologo -c Release
scripts.setup: npm i && cd client && npm i && cd ../code-analysis-server/CodeAnalysisServer && dotnet restore
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run analysis:dev" "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev"
scripts.build: npm run analysis:build && npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.release: concurrently "npm run analysis:release" "npm run server:release" "npm run client:release"
